items.content_html: The YouTube Playback Controller is a lightweight and powerful Chrome extension that allows you to control YouTube video playback using both a customizable UI and global keyboard shortcuts. With simple, intuitive controls, you can play/pause, skip to the next or previous video, rewind or forward by 5 secondsâ€”all without leaving your current tab.
